Split Fiction
Gather and equip both ability and item cards to your samurai , making them even stronger as you progress. Building powerful synergies /combinations between your party members will be crucial in determining the outcome of each battle.

As you delve deeper, the surroundings become increasingly twisted, corrupt, and intricate.
